summary: In Chicago, an unemployed actor aims to solve the mystery concerning a string of ax murders, apparently committed by a lunatic.
cast: Lew Ayres|Laraine Day|Basil Rathbone|Walter Kingsford|Miles Mander|Charles D. Brown|Cliff Clark|James Flavin|Russell Gleason|William Tannen|Mark Daniels|Bert Roach|Russell Hicks|Charles Wagenheim|Robert Homans|Iris Adrian|Ruth Alder|Ernie Alexander|Sam Ash|Hooper Atchley|King Baggot|William Bailey|Arthur Belasco|Brooks Benedict|Margaret Bert|Robert Bradford|Ralph Brooks|Rand Brooks|Eddie Buzard|Bobby Callahan|George M. Carleton|Wally Cassell|Eddy Chandler|Jules Cowles|Mary Currier|Cliff Danielson|Leslie Denison|Lester Dorr|Ralph Dunn|Byron Foulger|Jack Gardner|Rudy Germane|Mahlon Hamilton|Edward Hearn|Edna Holland|John Ince|William Lally|George Magrill|Jerry Maren|Frank Marlowe|Frank McLure|Dick Midgley|Harold Miller|James Millican|Roger Moore|Arthur O'Connell|George Ovey|Eddie Parker|Milton Parsons|Lee Phelps|'Snub' Pollard|Frances Rafferty|Cyril Ring|Edwin Stanley|Count Stefenelli|Ray Teal|David Tihmar|Emmett Vogan|Frank Whitbeck|Joe Yule
title: Fingers at the Window
